results.title: Best Flea Markets NYC Has to Offer For Vintage, Antiques and More
results.content:
FAD Market
FAD Market

Shop 'til you drop at FAD Market, a curated fashion, art and design pop-up marketplace, which is back for 2025. Expect to see your favorite makers plus brand new creatives to help you live smarter, gift better and support local businesses.

FAD—which stands for Fashion, Art and Design—takes over different venues with a horde of independent vendors and creators. Admission is free and dogs are welcome! [...] Peruse handmade jewelry, apparel, skincare products, tableware, artisanal packaged food, and more. Whether you're shopping for you or a friend (or even getting an early on that holiday shopping), there are plenty of local gems to pick up.

Here's the full schedule.

### 9. Queens Night Market

Queens Night Market
Queens Night Market [...] While Queens Night Market is more of a foodie experience, there's also a solid shopping experience there, too. Shop for vintage apparel, handmade jewelry, ceramic products, locally produced art pieces, crochet toys, stationery, and much more—in addition to incredible food and drinks.

The festival runs on Saturday nights through the summer at the New York Hall of Science in Flushing Meadows Corona Park.

### 10. Ludlow Flea

A post shared by Ludlow Flea Market (@ludlowflea)

The Bronx Night Market is a free, family-friendly festival held on the last Saturday of each month from April to October at Fordham Plaza, featuring diverse food vendors, local artisans, and live entertainment that celebrates the culture and community of the Bronx.

The "Downtown Manhattan" Night Market! SUMMER 2025

# The "Downtown Manhattan" Night Market! SUMMER 2025

Experience the energy of Downtown Manhattan! Celebrate NYC culture, connect with business minds, and enjoy a great opportunity to network!

## Date and time

## Location

Located in Lower Manhattan!

## Good to know

Highlights

Refund Policy

## About this event [...] Join us for an unforgettable evening at the Downtown Manhattan Night Market! This exciting event brings together the best of the city's vibrant culture with a mix of local shopping, delicious food, live entertainment, and much more. Whether you're a Artist, Foodie, Entrepenuer , Fashion enthusiast, or just looking for a fun night out, there's something for everyone!

results.title: 3rd & B'zaar
results.content:
Join us for an evening of jewelry making with Delphine Le Goff!

Delphine is a French artist & designer who resides in the East Village. She also co-owns the East Village boutique 3rd & B’zaar with her partner, Maegan Hayward who will also be in attendance helping bring on your creative spirit! Some pieces available for upcycling will be vintage provided by East Village Vintage Collective the second shop Maegan Hayward owns in the East Village. [...] THE GOODS:🍐 handmade glass jewelry by @p34r.w34r   
☠️ Y2K + punk vintage by @sipastak124   
🍒 handpainted garments by @molamola.ny   
🕯️ candles by @concretegardencandles   
👛 handmade recycled bags by @nyckaterina [...] 3rd & B'zaar
3rd & B'zaar

Welcome to 3rd & B’zaar!

We are a pop-up market and event space located at 191 East 3rd St (Storefront West), between Ave A and Ave B, in Manhattan’s East Village, NYC.

Email: 3rdandbzaar@gmail.com / Phone: 347-304-1922

We are currently hosting the Summer Vintage & Thrift Market, Wednesdays through Sundays, with extra events to be announced!

results.answer: The East Village Night Market features independent crafts and street food vendors in New York City. It runs on Saturday nights in 2025. Specific dates are not provided.
